alert.note: Alert for Brown; Callahan; Coleman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 11:27PM CDT until May 23 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Callahan County in west central Texas... Brown County in west central Texas... Northeastern Coleman County in west central Texas... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1127 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cross Cut, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Byrds around 1145 PM CDT. May and Lake Brownwood State Park around 1150 PM CDT. Early around 1205 AM CDT. Blanket around 1210 AM CDT. Zephyr around 1220 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Indian Creek, Owens and Thrifty. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
